findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant using the constant keyword to ensure they cannot be changed after being set and decrease gas consumption.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not adhere to the Solidity style guide, which can negatively impact readability and maintainability.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables that have been configured on user-supplied input without proper check for zero value, leading to potential problems when the contract is executed.
